headphones.title: SuperX
headphones.subtitle: Di2
headphones.main_text: Cross Boss. Incredibly confident handling, unmatched traction, and huge mud & tire clearance make this ultra-light machine the ultimate 'cross racing rig.

highlights.line1: Shimano Ultegra/XT Di2 Drivetrain, 11-speed / Shimano Ultegra Hydro Disc Brakes
highlights.line2: HollowGram Si Crankset, OPI SpideRing, 40T, X-Sync
highlights.line3: HollowGram Si Disc Carbon Clincher tubeless Wheelset / Vittoria Terreno Mix TNT tubeless ready Tires

headphones.title: CAAD Optimo
headphones.subtitle: Tiagra
headphones.main_text: Success within reach. A performance road bike with race-winning DNA. Smooth, fast, affordableâ€”pick three.

highlights.line1: Lightweight SmartForm C2 Alloy Frame w/ full carbon fork

headphones.title: Topstone Carbon
headphones.subtitle: Lefty 1
headphones.main_text: More Give. More Go. More Lefty. A gravel bike to beat all gravel bikes. Dual suspension makes this the most off-road capable and on-road comfortable road bike ever made.

highlights.line1: BallisTec carbon frame with Kingpin suspension / Lefty Oliver Carbon gravel fork, 30mm travel
highlights.line2: SRAM Force/X01 Eagle eTap AXS HRD 12-speed group / HollowGram 23 carbon wheels
highlights.line3: HollowGram SAVE bar-stem / Integrated Cannondale App connectivity
highlights.where: Gravel roads, Up and down hills, Out in the elements
